name: Space Gunner (GerardB)
description:
Travel the galaxy, kill aliens, gather coins and get stronger 🚀💢👾🔫

Controls 

W,A,S,D to move Left Click to shoot R to reload

If you get hit while holding no coins you’ll die 💰💀

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

 Credits

Code by: Gerard Belenguer

Art and shaders by: Gerard Belenguer (except the stone texture)

Music: No copyright music and sfx from Unity's Humble Bundle pack 🔊

Follow we on twitter for more thingies made by me: @GerardBelenguer (https://twitter.com/GerardBelenguer)
